text: The first problem for all of us, men and women, is not to learn, but to unlearn.
author: Gloria Steinem

text: As far as the men who are running for president are concerned, they aren't even people I would date.
author: Nora Ephron

text: As soon as the land of any country has all become private property, the landlords, like all other men, love to reap where they never sowed, and demand a rent even for its natural produce.
author: Adam Smith

text: Women are systematically degraded by receiving the trivial attentions which men think it manly to pay to the sex, when, in fact, men are insultingly supporting their own superiority.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

text: English culture is basically homosexual in the sense that the men only really care about other men.
author: Germaine Greer
